N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 11.18 - Emergency disconnections of residences

State Regulations
A distribution utility may disconnect service to a
residence when an emergency may threaten the health or safety of a person, a
surrounding area or the utility's distribution system. The distribution utility
shall act promptly to assure restoration of service as soon as feasible. Service shall be restored to any residence before it may be disconnected for
any other reason. Notes
